name: Transformation Scroll (Anolian)
description: Use it to transform into Anolian for a while. Attention! The effect will vanish when mounted or dead. This item can’t be canceled once unsealed.

name: Transformation Scroll (Cat Finance Minister)
chineseName: 喵星财务大臣变身卷轴
description: After use, Becomes Cat Finance Minister for a certain period. Note! When rides or dies, the transformation will be cancelled. Your action cannot be cancelled after the item has been opened. (Able to transform into a Big Cat warrior for a short time, which seems to be able to cause a heavy blow to the evil creatures that will appear at a certain time on the earth. Note: Cat Finance Minister cannot walk to move!)
